src: "Pari zvino tave nembeva ina-dzine mwedzi-mina dzisina chirwere cheshuga kunyange dzaimbova nechirwere cheshuga", akadaro zvakare.
mt: "We have a lot of work to do in the next 10 days to ensure that no one dies of cancer," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, purofesa wezvekurapa wepaDalhousie University muHalifax, Nova Scotia uye sachigaro webazi rezvekurapa uye zvesainzi reCanadian Diabetes Association akapa yambiro yekuti tsvakurudzo yacho ichiri kutanga.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and a member of the Canadian Diabetes Association, said the discovery was "groundbreaking."
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Sevamwe vana mazvikokota, haanyatsotenda kuti chirwere cheshuga chinogona kurapwa, achitarisa kuti zviwanikwa hazvina basa nevanhu vane chirwere cheshuga cheType 1.
mt: Some experts, however, say that the disease is not contagious, and that it is important to note that people with Type 1 diabetes do not pose a risk to others.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Nemusi weMuvhuro, Sara Danius, munyori weNoble Committee for Literature paSwedish Academy, akataura paredhiyo yeSveriges kuti sezvo vakanga vatadza kubata Bob Dylan pachake nezvekuhwina kwake mubairo weNobel Prize in Literature wa2016, vakanga vasiyana nekuramba vachiedza kumutsvaga.
mt: 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature committee chair Sara Danius told Swedish media that the committee had been divided over whether to award Bob Dylan the prize, with some members arguing that he was not a writer.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius akati, "Iye zvino hapana zvatiri kuita. Ndakatumira maemail kumunhu waanoshanda naye waari pedyo naye zvikuru uye akapindura zvakanakanaka. Saka tingati taedzawo zvatinokwanisa.
mt: "I don't think there's anything to be done. I killed the man who was in the car with me, who was my best friend and a very good person. So we just have to accept what happened."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Mukuru weRing, Jamie Siminoff, akambenge ataura kuti kambani yake yakatanga kubva pakusanzwika kwebhero rechitoro chake chemugaraji.
mt: Ring co-founder Jamie Siminoff announced that his company has begun shipping its first product, a video doorbell.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Akati akagadzira bhero repadhoo rinoshandisa masaisai eWifi.
mt: 3D printer uses WiFi to create a chair.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff akati zvitengeso zvakasimudzwa mushure mekuonekwa kwake muchikamu che Shark Tank muna2013 apo vatungamiri vemutambo vakaramba kutsigira nemari bhisimusi rekutanga iri.
mt: Siminoff said the idea was inspired by his appearance on the reality show Shark Tank in 2013, where he pitched the idea to investors.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Kokupedzisira kwegore ra2017, Siminoff aibuda panhepfenyuro yeQVC yepa terevhizheni yekutenga.
mt: 2017 marked the end of Siminoff's tenure as host of the QVC shopping channel.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring yakagadzirisawo mhosva nekambani yainokwikwidzana nayo pane zvekuchengetedza, yeADT Corporation.
mt: The company, ADT Corporation, is a leading provider of electronic security services.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Pane mushonga wakawanikwa wekudzivirira Ebola uye zvakatombobatsira pakuderedza vanhu vari kufa nechirwere ichi, asi kusvikira pari zvino, hapana mushonga wati wawanikwa wekurapa mhando yeutachiona huripo iye zvino.
mt: With a vaccine for Ebola and treatments that have saved lives, the disease is now on the decline, but there is no vaccine yet.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Rimwe piritsi rekudzivirira, ZMapp,pakutanga rakaratidza seraigona kushanda, asi tsvakurudzo dzakaratidza kuti raigovera zvishoma pane zvaidiwa mukudzivirira rufu.
mt: 1 of 2 experimental Ebola treatments, ZMapp, was initially promising, but the drugmaker says it has halted production because of the high cost of making it.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Mukuyedza kwePALM, ZMapp yaibatsira sechokudzora, zviine revo yekuti wezvesayenzi vakaishandisa sehwaro vachiona kana paine musiyano pakati payo nemamwe marapiro matatu.
mt: The PALM trial, which used ZMapp in 69 patients, found that the drug was safe and effective in treating Ebola.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics inotsigira zvakataurwa mutsamba yeKomiti yeUnited States yemaOlympics uye inobvuma kuti zvinokosha kuiti vanhu vese vanotamba mumaOlympics vachengetedzwe.
mt: USA Gymnastics has filed a motion to dismiss the lawsuit brought by the United States Olympic Committee, which it says is frivolous.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Tinobvumirana nezvakataurwa neUSOC kuti kana tichida kufadza vatambi, zvikwata zvavo uye kuchengetedza mutambo uyu, tinofanira kugadzirisa zvinhu musangano redu pane kuti tiriparadze.
mt: We are in contact with the USOC to make sure that if we do have athletes, their equipment and their bags are safe, and we need to make sure that we get them out of here.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Sangano reUSA Gymnastics rinotsigira kuongorora kwaiitwa nevanhu vakazvimirira sezvo kuchigona kujekesa kuti sei kutsanangurwa kwakaitwa nevanhu vakabatwa chibharo naLarry Nassar kwakatora nguva refu kuti kuzozivikanwa uye kugamuchirwa.
mt: The USA Gymnastics organization has been accused of covering up allegations that Larry Nassar sexually abused young athletes for years before he was finally brought to justice.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Vemitambo yemiviri vekuUSA uye ve USOC vane chinangwa chimwe chete -- kugadzira mutambo wemiviri, neimwe, ichengetedzeke sezvinobvira kune vatambi kuti vatevedzere zvishuvo zvavo munzvimbo yakachengeteta, yakanaka uye yavanosimudzirwa.
mt: Other U.S. athletes and the U.S. Olympic Committee have a different take -- the flag bearer, who is also an Olympic medalist, is a role model for young people, and should be a positive example.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal â€” making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Mumakore ekuma1960, Brzezinski ndiye aishanda sachipangamazano waJohn F. Kennedy uye akazoshandawo mumahofisi makuru aLyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski was a young aide to John F. Kennedy and later a top official in the Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Munguva yesarudzo dzakaitwa muna 1976, akaudza Carter mashandiro anoita mitemo yekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, uye akazoshandawo sachipangamazano musangano rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika kubvira muna 1977 kusvika muna 1981, achitora chinzvimbo chaHenry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, he told Carter that other countries were following suit, and he was responsible for the signing of the Helsinki Accords in 1975, which lasted until 1981, and he was replaced by Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Paaiva Chipangamazano wekuchengeteka kwenyika, akabatsira vaCarter kudzikamisa zvinhu pasi rese kubudikidza nekukurukurirana kwenyika nenyika, sezvakaitika painonzi Camp David Accords, ya1978; kugadzirisa ushamwari hweUSA neChina makore ekuma 1970 ava kunopera; Kuratidzira kwevagari vemuIran, uko kwakazoita kuti vanhu vemuIran vakawanda vasungwe, muna 1979; uye kupinda nechisimba kwakaita Soviet muAfghanistan, muna 1979.
mt: 1978: President Jimmy Carter brokered the Camp David Accords, which led to the signing of a peace treaty between Egypt and Israel; normalized relations between the United States and China, which had been frozen since the 1970s; helped bring about the fall of the Shah of Iran, which led to the rise of the Ayatollah Khomeini and the Islamic Revolution; and helped bring about the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, which began in 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing USâ€“China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Firimu rinobudisa Ryan Gosling naEmma Stone, rakafarirwa chaizvo mumaguta ese makuru.
mt: 2016 film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated for 14 Academy Awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling naStone vakagamuchira sarudzo yekuva mutambi wakagonesa wechirume newechikadzi zvichiteerana.
mt: Gosling and Stone were acquitted of charges of incest after a trial.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Vamwe vanowana mubayiro vanosanganisira vakatora mufananidzo wakanakisisa, munhu ainyatsoronga kuti firimu ribude zvakanaka, vaitora mavhidhiyo, akasarudza hembe dzainge dzakapfeka vanhu mufirimu, akaedhita firimu, akaisa mimhanzi, pamwe chete nevamwewo vakaita kuti firimu racho rinyatsobuda zvakanaka.

ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Nziyo mbiri kubva mufirimu, Audition (The Fools who Dream) uye City of Stars, dzakagamuchira kusarudzwa pachimbo chakanakisa chekutanga. Lionsgate studio yakagamuchira sarudzo 26 - kupfuura chero ipi imwe situdhiyo.
mt: 2 of the 5 songs nominated for Best Original Song, Audition (The Fools who Dream) and City of Stars, were performed by the movie's star, Emma Stone. Lionsgate studio won the award for Best Picture, the first time in 20 years.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations â€” more than any other studio.

src: Musi weSvondo, Mutungamiri wenyika yeUnited States, Donald Trump, akataura achimiririrwa nemunyori wake mune zvenhau, achiti masoja ake aizobuda munyika yeSyria.
mt: On Sunday, the President of the United States, Donald Trump, was seen on television, telling his aides that he would bomb Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Chiziviso ichi chakapiwa pashure pekunge Trump ataura pafoni nemutungamiriri wenyika yeTurkey anonzi Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
mt: This was given in a press conference when Trump was speaking on the phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip ErdoÄŸan.

src: Turkey yaizopindawo pakurinda varwi weISIS vakabatwa avo, mukuwirirana nemashoko akataurwa, nyika dzemuEurope dziri kuramba kuvaendesa kumusha kwavo.
mt: Turkey has closed its border with Syria to stop ISIS fighters from entering, and the European Union is considering sending troops to help refugees.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Izvi zvinotsigira kuti mamwe madinosaur aiva neminhenga, iyo inova dzidziso yavakuzivikanwa nevakawanda, uye zvinojekesa zvimwe zvinhu zvisingawanikwe pane zvakacherwa, zvakadai seruvara uye mumhu wezvaakanga akaita.
mt: The discovery suggests that some dinosaurs were armored, with some of the armor being identified as a form of bone, and some of the features were shared with modern birds, suggesting a close relationship.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Nyanzvi dzesainzi dzinoti makushe emhuka iyi aive chestnut-brown kumusoro kana mavara ecarotenoid pazasi.
mt: 1. The leaves of this tree are chestnut-brown in color and contain carotenoid pigments.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Zvakawanikwa pashure petsvakurudzo yakaitwa zvinoita kuti tiwedzere kunzwisisa kwakabva neminhenga yeshiri.
mt: It is unclear whether the crash was caused by a technical fault or pilot error.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Nekuda kwekuti minhenga yedinosaur haina kunyatsovakika, zvinodaidzwa kuti rachis, asi panezvimwewo zvine zviratidzo seminhenga - mabarb nemabarbuls - vaongorori vakazoita fungidziro kuti rachis ingangove shanduko yakazoitika yekuvandudza mushure mezvimwe zvinhu zvose izvi.
mt: Because the dinosaur's tail is not preserved, it is suggested that the tail was long, but there are other clues to the dinosaur's appearance - the ribs, and the ribs - that indicate the dinosaur had a long tail.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers â€” barbs and barbules â€” the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Mamiriro akaita minhenga inotaridza kuti haana kushandiswa pakubhururuka asi pakudzora mwero wekudziya uye kushongedza. Vatsvakurudzi vakapa maonero ekuti, kunyange zvazvo riri besu redhinoza diki, semburu yacho inoratidzika semanhenga eshiri hombe kwete enhiyo.
mt: The investigation is ongoing, but the authorities have said that the plane was not being used for commercial purposes and that the crash was not an accident. The authorities have also said that the plane was not being used for commercial purposes and that the crash was not an accident.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Vaongorori vacho vakataura kuti kunyange zvazvo uyu waiva muswe wedinosaur diki, minhenga yacho ndeyechinhu chikuru kwete chidiki.
mt: Their parents say the dinosaur is a big deal, not a little one.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Nezuro mangwanani, bhomba rakaputikira pamahofisi makuru emapurisa muGaziantep, kuTurkey, rakauraya mapurisa maviri uye rikakuvadza vamwe vanhu vanopfuura 20.
mt: In the early hours of the morning, a bomb exploded in the main square of Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two police officers and injuring 20 others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Hofisi yagavhuna yakataura kuti gumi nevapfumbamwe vevakakuvara vaive mapurisa.
mt: 5 people were injured in the crash.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Mapurisa anofungidzira kuti musoja anoshanda neDaesh (ISIL) anogona kunge ariye akabhomba.
mt: Police say the suspect is a Daesh (ISIL) sympathizer.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Vakaona kuti Zuva rinongoita sezvinoita dzimwe nyeredzi: Zvinoitwa nenyeredzi dzese muchadenga zvakaonekwa kuti zvinobva pakujeka kwadzinoita nekutenderera kwadzinoita chete.
mt: 24 hours later, the airport reopens: The runway is cleared of debris and the airport is back in operation.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Simba rarinobudisa pamwe nekutenderera kwarinoita ndiko kunoshandiswa kuzoziva inonzi Rossby number, iyo inoenderana neplasma flow.
mt: The phenomenon is also known as the Rossby number, which describes the relationship between plasma flow and the plasma.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Kana nhamba yeRossby ichiwedzera kuva duku, simba renyeredzi rinowedzerawo kuderera zvichienderana nekuchinjana kwesimba remagineti.
mt: When the Rossby number is small, the jet stream can meander, or wander, in a way that is related to the formation of weather systems.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Paaiva parwendo, Iwasaki akasangana akamboomerwa kakawanda.
mt: 2 days later, Iwasaki was found dead in a pool of blood.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Akabirwa nevapambi, akarwiswa muTibet nembwa inechirwere chembwamupengo, akapoya muchato muNepal uye akazosungwa kuIndia.
mt: He was born in Tibet, raised in Nepal, and lived in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Iyo 802.11n inoshanda pa2.4Ghz uye pa5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Izvi zvichaita kuti ikwanise kushandidzana ne802.11a, 802.11b uye 802.11g, chero bedzi chiteshi chayo chikuru chiine maradhedhiyo maviri maviri.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are all compatible, but the higher the number, the faster the speed.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Kumhanya kwe802.11n kunodarika kwemichina yakambotanga iyo isingadarike 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n is the first standard to break the 600Mbit/s barrier.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, ane mudzimai zvakare vana vaviri vakura, haana kuratidza chimiro chakanaka kunaMiller, uyo anga ane hukama nenyaya.
mt: Duvall, who has two children, has not been charged with any crime in Miller's death, who was also homeless.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Paakabvunzwa kuti aionawo sei nyaya iyi, MIller akati, "Mike akataura zvakawanda paikurukurwa nyaya iyi... Ini ndakanga ndichigadzirira saka handina zvakawanda zvandakanzwa pane zvaakataura."
mt: When asked how he knew about the incident, Miller said, "Mike was talking a lot about this incident... I was listening and I didn't hear much of what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Tichaedza kuderedza hutsi hwakasviba zvichienderana neGDP nechikamu chakakura mugore ra2020 kubva pane chikamu chemuna 2005", akadaro Hu.
mt: "We expect to grow the economy by 7.5 percent this year, compared to 2005's GDP," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Haana kutaura mafiga ekuderedzwa, akataura kuti zvaizogadzirwa maringe nehupfumi hwenyika yeChina.
mt: It is not clear if the fire was caused by a bomb or a cigarette, but the airport is located in a province that has been the site of recent anti-government protests.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu akakurudzira nyika dzichiri kubudirira kuti "siyai nzira dzekare dzekutanga masvibisa mozoedza kugadzirisa mushure."
mt: He said the country was "not ready for the first phase of the project" and that "we need to be more careful."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Akawedzera kuti "havafanire, zvisinei, kukumbirwa kuita zvinhu zvinodarika danho ravo rekubudirira, zvavanotarisirwa uye zvavanogona".
mt: "It's not easy, it's not simple, it's not a walk in the park, it's not a piece of cake, it's not a cup of tea, it's not a glass of water, it's not a bottle of beer, it's not a can of coke, it's not a can of beer, it's not a can of soda, it's not a can of pop, it's not a can of seltzer, it's not a can of ginger ale, it's not a can of lemonade, it's not a can of lemon lime, it's not a can of lemon lime soda, it's not a can of lemon lime seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime pop, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop, it's not a can of lemon lime soda seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer, it's not a can of lemon lime soda pop seltzer
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Iraq Study Group yakataura mushumo wayo na12.00 GMT nhasi.
mt: The Iraq Study Group is scheduled to release its report at 12:00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Inopa yambiro yekuti hapana anogona kupa vimbiso yekuti chero zvichaitwa neIraq iye zvino zvinomisa hondo dzezvikwata, kuwedzera mhirizhonga, kana kutanga nyonga nyonga.
mt: The report also notes that Iraq has not yet responded to the U.S. request for a timetable for withdrawal, and that the U.S. has not yet begun to withdraw.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Chirevo ichi chinovhura nekutererera kwegakava nekuumbwa kwenhaurirano muUnited States pamusoro pamutemo yekuenda kuPakati pekuMabvazuva.
mt: This event is the first of its kind in the United States since the September 11 attacks.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Ripoti yacho yakashoropodza zvakanyanya zvinenge zvese zviri mubumbiro revari kuona nezvazvo uye yakati zvinofanira kuchinjwa nekukurumidza.
mt: The report was unclear as to the exact cause of the crash and will require further investigation.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Chekutanga pazvinhu 78 zvakanzi neripoti yacho zviitwe ndechekuti pave nekukurukura kutsva pakati pevatungamiriri venyika yeUnited States neIraq kwekuti miganhu yeIraq idzivirirwe kumhandu dzingangopindira gore rino risati rapera uye kuti Iraq iumbe ushamwari nenyika dzayakavakidzana nayo.
mt: 78 of the reports were identified as being false because of confusion between the United States and Iraq over the location of the attacks and the fact that Iraq is a member of the coalition and is not a target.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraqâ€™s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Seneta aripo parizvino uyezve ari mudzimai wemutungamiriri wenyika Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner, akazivisa nezvechido chake chokukwikwidza semutungamiri wenyika nezuro manheru muLa Plata, guta riri makiromita 50 (31 mamayera) kubva kuBuenos Aires.
mt: The president's husband, also a former president, was also in the plane, which was flying from La Plata, about 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Pavaiva kuArgentine Theatre, Mai Kirchner vakataura kuti vanoda kukwikwidzawo musarudzo dzemutungamiriri wenyika, uye nzvimbo iyi ndiyo imwe chete yavakatanga kutsvaga rutsigiro rwekuva Seneta senhengo yeBuenos Aires mugore ra2005.
mt: At the Argentine Theatre, First Lady Kirchner said she wanted to thank the military for their service, and this was the first time she had visited the base since becoming first lady in 2005.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Gakava rakakonzerwa nekupesana pamusoro pekushandisa mari pakubatsira vanhu vakawirwa neHurricane Katrina uye kuvaka patsva zvivako zvakaparadzwa; uye vamwe vanhu vanochengetedza mari vari kutoseka nyaya iyi vachiipa zita rekuti "Bush's New Orleans Deal.
mt: The bill was criticized for using federal funds to rebuild homes damaged by Hurricane Katrina and for providing tax breaks to some homeowners; others called it "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Kunyunyuta kweLiberal pamusoro pekuumba patsva kwakatarisa kupihwa kwezvibvumirano zvekuvaka zvakare kune vanoonekwa sevagari vemukati meWashington.
mt: 2012 election results have been delayed by a recount in Washington state.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana vakaenda kuRoma kunhamo.
mt: 1000s of people are marching in Rome today.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Paiva nevanhu vakawanda zvekuti havasi vese vakakwanisa kupinda muSt.Peter's Square.
mt: 1.5 million people are estimated to have attended the event, with many unable to enter St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Pakaiswa materevhizheni mahombe munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana muRome kuti vanhu vaone chiitiko ichi.
mt: Police have set up checkpoints in different parts of Rome to find the suspect.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Mumamwe maguta mazhinji eItaly uye mudzimwe nyika, kunyanya kuPoland, makagadzirwa zvinhu zvakadaro, uye zvakaonekwa nevanhu vakawanda.
mt: In Italy and other countries, including Poland, the new law requires the use of a helmet, and the use of a seat belt is mandatory for all passengers.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Vanyori vezvakaitika kare vakashoropodza FBI nekunyanya kuisa mari panyaya dziri nyore kugadzirisa dzakadai sedzekubiwa kwemota, vachitira kuti vanzi vari kugona basa.
mt: The FBI has been called in to investigate the incident, which is being treated as a major crime, and the police have said they are looking for suspects.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Congress yakatsigira nemari kuti chimwe chinhu chiitwe panyaya yezvinonyadzisira muna 2005 uye yakataura kuti FBI inofanira kuita kuti vamiririri vayo gumi vaone nezvezvinonyadzisira zvevanhu vakuru.
mt: 2005 Congress hearings suggested that something was amiss in the 2001 investigation and the FBI was ordered to find out what.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa ndiye akaita maruns akawanda kudarika vamwe vese. Akaita maruns 70 pamabhora 41 aakakandirwa; akarova 11 ma4 ne2 ma6.
mt: 70 runs was the highest score in a single over. 41 balls were bowled; 11 maidens and 2 wides.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Vatambi vecricket vepakati vanoti Sachin Tandelkar naRahul Dravid vakatamba zvakanaka uye vakaita zvibozwa zana vachibatsirana.
mt: Cricket teammates Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid both scored centuries and shared a record partnership.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Asi, mushure mekurasikirwa newicket yakeputeni, India yakangomhanya ka36 vachirasikirwa nemawiketi 7 zvichipedza mutambo.
mt: 36 people were killed and 7 injured in a stampede at a train station in India.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Mukuru wenyika ye U.S George W. Bush akasvika kuSingapore mangwanani emusi wa16 Mbudzi, achitanga kushanya kwakareba vhiki.
mt: 16th U.S President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore early this morning for a two-day visit.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Akakwaziswa nemutevedzeri wegurukota reSingapore Wong Kan Seng uye vakakurukura zvekutengeserana nedzehungandanga nemutungamiriri weSingapore Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: Singapore's foreign minister and prime minister's wife were given a tour of the crash site by Singapore's defense minister.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Mushure mekuva nevhiki rekukundikana musarudzo yetemu yepakati, Bush akaudza vateereri nezve kuvandudza kutengeserana muAsia.
mt: After a brief pause for the ceremony, Bush told reporters that he was looking forward to strengthening ties in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Mukuru weMakurukota Stephen Harper abvuma kuendesa "Mutemo weMhepo Yakachena" wehurumende kukomiti yemapato ese kuti uongororwe, usati vanzwikwa kechipiri , pashure pemusangano wemusi weChipiri wemaminitsi 25 nemutungamiriri weNDP Jack Layton kuPMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper announced the government will introduce the "Clean Air Act" to Parliament, which will not be voted on until after the next election, in order to avoid a confidence vote, which would trigger an election, with the next election set for October 14 and NDP leader Jack Layton as the opposition leader.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton anga akumbira shanduko kumutemo wemaConseravatives uri maringe nenharaunda pamusangano naPM, akakumbira, "kutanga kunyatsonyorwazve" mutemo wenharaunda wakaiswa nebato remaConservative.
mt: Layton is expected to return to the House of Commons on Monday, where he will be the first Conservative to speak in the budget debate. He says, "I will be the first to say that the budget is not perfect."
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Kutangira apo Hurumende yeNyika yakapindira pakubhadharira kushandiswa kweChipatara cheMersey muDevonport, Tasmania, hurumende yemudunhu nemamwe maMP ehurumende vakashora chiito ichi vachiti chaitirwa kuda kuonekwa zvichitevera sarudzo dzehurumende dzichaitwa muna Mbudzi.
mt: The Australian government has announced the cancellation of the construction of the new Mersey class patrol boat in Devonport, Tasmania, with the government and some MPs saying the project was too expensive and too risky.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Mutungamiri weHurumende John Howard akataura kuti zvinhu zvakaitwa zvakaitirwa kuchengetedza zvivako zvechipatara kuti chirege kudzikisirwa zvachiri nehurumende yekuTasmania, ndosaka akapa mari yekuwedzera inokwana mamiriyoni AUD$45.
mt: Prime Minister John Howard said the government had taken steps to ensure the airport was not closed by the strike, which he said was "unfortunate" and "unhelpful" and cost taxpayers $45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Zvichienderana nenhau dzapedzisira kubuda, zviverengwa zvegungwa zvakaratidza kuti tsunami yanga irikuuya. Paive nekuitika kwetsunami kwakanyorwa pedyo nePago Pago neNiue.
mt: In contrast to the tsunami that devastated the area, the earthquake was felt as far away as Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Hapana zvinhu zvikuru zvakaparadzwa kana vanhu vakanyanya kukuvara muTonga, asi magetsi akatomboenda zvekanguva, izvo zvakaita kuti vakuru vakuru veko vatadze kuzivisa vamwe nezvetsunami, sekunyeverwa kwainge kwaitwa nePTWC.
mt: There are no major damages or injuries reported in Tonga, but power is out in the capital, Nuku'alofa, which has been flooded by the tsunami, according to the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Zvikoro zvinokwana 14 zvekuHawaii zviri pamhenderekedzo yegungwa kana kuti pedyo nemhenderekedzo yegungwa zvainge zvakavhara musi weChitatu, zuva rese, kunyange zvazvo yambiro yainge yabviswa.
mt: 14 earthquakes in Hawaii were felt or recorded as felt on Monday, the third day in a row that earthquakes were felt or recorded as felt.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Purezidhendi weU.S. George W. Bush akagamuchira chiziviso chacho.
mt: 2004 U.S. presidential candidate George W. Bush has denied the claim.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Mutauriri wavaBush, Gordon Johndroe akati zvakavimbiswa neNorth Korea "idanho rakakura rekusvika pachinangwa chekubvisa zvombo zvenyukureya kunonyatsooneka munyika iyi."
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said North Korea's "provocative actions" have "failed to bring about the results they seek in this country."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Dutu regumi remwaka wemadutumupengo weAltantic , rinonzi Dutumupengo Jerry, ratanga mugungwa reAtlantic nhasi.
mt: 50 years ago today, the Atlantic Ocean was crossed for the first time by a jet aircraft, the Atlantic Jerry.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: VeNational Hurricane Center (NHC) vanoti pari zvino Jerry haina chero njodzi panyika.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says Jerry is not expected to strengthen further.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: MaEngineer eU.S. Corps vakafungidzira kuti mainji 6 emvura yekunaya aigona kukanganisa maLeeves aiva ambokuvadzwa kare.
mt: 6 inches of rain fell in the area, causing the Leeves to overflow.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Wadhi yechipfumbamwe, yakabatwa nemafashamu anga akakwira kusvika mafiti 20 panguva yedutu reKatrina, iri pakati pemvura yakapfuura chiuno sezvo chidziviriro chaivapo chakapfuurwa nemvura.
mt: 20 years after Hurricane Katrina, the city is still recovering from the storm's destruction, which flooded 80 percent of the city and displaced more than 1 million people.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Mvura iri kurasikira kumahombekombe kunzvimbo yakafara mafiti 100.
mt: 100 miles of coastline is under flood warning.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Mutungamiriri wepurojekiti yeCommons, VaAdam Cuerden vakaratidza kurwadziwa nekudzimwa kwemifananidzo iyi pavakataura neWikinews mwedzi wapera.
mt: Commons project lead Adam Cuerden was interviewed by Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "[Wales] Akatirevera nhema kubvira pamavambo. Kutanga, nekuita sekuti izvi zvaiva zvikonzero zvine chokuita nemutemo, Chechipiri, nekunyepera sekunge aitipa nzeve, kusvika pakudzimwa kwebasa rake chaipo."
mt: "[Wales] He was driving on the wrong side of the road. First, he was driving on the wrong side of the road, and then he was driving on the wrong side of the road, and then he was driving on the wrong side of the road, and then he was driving on the wrong then he was driving on the wrong side of the road, and then he was driving on the wrong side of the road, and then he
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Kusvotwa kwakaitwa vanhu kwakaita kuti pagadzirwe bumbiro rinoona nezvekuisa zvinhu zvine chekuita nezvepabonde pawebsite yacho iyo ine mamiriyoni emakambani anoisa zvinhu zvavo ipapo.
mt: The site was taken down after users reported that the site was showing images of the crash and the dead.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Basa rakaitwa raiva rekungoverenga, asi chirongwa chakanyorwa kuti chitevedzere zvakaonekwa munyeredzi dzekuSagittarius.
mt: The fire was extinguished, but the damage was extensive and visible in the constellation of Sagittarius.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Chikwata ichi chaitsvaga zvaingokonzerwa nemasimba ezvinhu zvikuru zviri muchadenga uye zvinhu zviri mugwara redu renzou reMilky Way.
mt: This galaxy is one of the most massive objects in the universe, containing billions of stars.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Zvinoitwa nemwedzi panyika kuti makungwa aite mafungu ndizvo zvimwe chete nezvinoitwa neGwara renzou paSagittarius galaxy.
mt: 2010 was also the year that the Hubble Space Telescope discovered a black hole in the center of the Milky Way galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Vanamazvikokota veSainzi vakapedzesa mukuti zvakasviba zvinobata zvimwe zvinhu zvakasviba nenzira yakafanana nezvinoita zvimwe zvakajairika.
mt: Scientists have used a new method to create a material that behaves like a liquid in some ways and a solid in others.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Dzidziso iyi inoti zvinhu zvitema zvakawanda zvinowanikwa panzvimbo yakaporeteredza boka renyeredzi, uye zvinoumbwa netwunhu twudikidiki twakawanda.
mt: The incident is the latest in a series of accidents involving the Thai military, which has been plagued by corruption scandals and a string of deadly crashes in recent years.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Zvirikutaurwa pachivhiti vhiti zvirikuburitsa hutsi hwakachena huchipwititika kubva pachirimwa.
mt: The cause of the accident is under investigation, but the plane was reported to have been in a steep climb.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Vakuru vakuru vemunharaunda iyi vari kunyevera vanhu vanogara pedyo nenzvimbo iyi kuti vagare mudzimba, vadzime michina inoita kuti mumba mutonhorere kana kuti mudziye, uye vari kunziwo varege kunwa mvura yemupombi.
mt: Residents of the area are being asked to stay away from the area, to avoid the smoke, and to turn off their water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Sekutaura kwakaita sangano rinoona nezvenyukireya kuJapan, zvinhu zvinoti radioactive cesium pamwe chete neiodine zvakawanikwa ipapo.
mt: The agreement was reached at a meeting of the Nuclear Safety Commission of Japan, which also decided to raise the allowable level of radioactive cesium and iodine in food.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Vakuru vakuru vemunzvimbo yacho vaiti izvi zvinoratidza kuti maichengeterwa uranium munofanira kunge makaputika uye iri kurasika.
mt: Local residents say the incident could have been a cover for the theft of uranium and that it is suspicious.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Chiremba Tony Moll ndivo vakawana utachiona hwechikosoro hwakaoma kurapa nemishonga (XDR-TB) mudunhu rekuSouth Africa reKwaZulu-Natal.
mt: 37-year-old Tony Moll is the first person in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal province to be diagnosed with extensively drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB).
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Paakabvunzurudzwa, akataura kuti mhando itsva yechirwere ichi "iri kushungurudza pamwe nekutyisa nekuti yava kuita kuti chirwere ichi chiuraye kupfuura zvachaiita."
mt: In response to questions, he said the "device is designed to be used in conjunction with a physician and is intended to be used to help diagnose a disease that is not fatal."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Vamwe varwere vanogona kuva vakabatira hutachiona muchipatara, semafungiro aDr Moll, uyezve vanokwana kuita vaviri vaiva vashandi vepachipatara.
mt: Some patients may have been exposed to radiation, according to Dr Moll, and two staff members have been evacuated.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
